name: Aniki (hevet, Javier Belmer, Alberto PDLT)
description:
Follow the story of two lost brothers, Christopher and his younger brother Timmy, as they attempt to make their way through this bizarre and treacherous landscape. This game mixes adventure and puzzles, all the while taking place in a harsh and cruel environment.


Themes for Vim Jam 2:
– Boss: You play as the older brother, Christopher, who takes the role of leader/boss for his younger brother, Timmy, guiding him throughout the game.
– On The Edge: The art, music, sound and overall ambience emit an eerie atmosphere that's sure to keep you 'on the edge'.


TEAM:
– Programming: JUAN IGNACIO BRITOS
– Art & Design: ALBERTO PALACIOS
– Music & Sound: JAVIER BELMER || Listen to the Soundtrack here!

––– EYES PUZZLE AID READ IF YOU ARE STUCK –––
We're aware that this puzzle is quite difficult to understand. There's a step by step explanation below. We will upload a video as soon as possible. It's not what we intended, but we hope the rest of the game is still enjoyable.

Read as far as you wish:
1. You and Timmy can both press buttons/eyes ( Z: You, X: Timmy)
2. There is an order in which you have to push the eyes.
3. The order is as follows (from left to right): second eye, third eye, first eye, and fourth eye.
4. Timing is key, so you must push the fourth button before the first button turns grey again.
–––––––––––––––


Thank you for playing!
